subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets, who have used six players at the injury-plagued shortstop position this season, made Gavin Cecchini, 18, the No. 12 overall pick in Monday’s draft.
snippet: The Mets, who have used six players at the injury-plagued shortstop position this season, made Gavin Cecchini, 18, the No. 12 overall pick in Monday’s draft.
